unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Galore: Your Dream Home Closer Than You Think!**
normalised: **Home Loan Schemes Galore: Your Dream Home Closer Than You Think!**

unnormalised: Hey there, future homeowners! Feeling overwhelmed by soaring property prices in Mumbai or Delhi? Don't sweat it! Banks and housing finance companies are tripping over themselves to offer attractive home loan schemes right now.
normalised: Hey there, future homeowners! Feeling overwhelmed by soaring property prices in Mumbai or Delhi? Don't sweat it! Banks and housing finance companies are tripping over themselves to offer attractive home loan schemes right now.

unnormalised: From SBI's festive bonanza to HDFC's low-interest deals, there's something for everyone. Even smaller players like Bajaj Finserv are getting in on the action, offering customized plans.
normalised: From S B I's festive bonanza to H D F C's low-interest deals, there's something for everyone. Even smaller players like Bajaj Finserv are getting in on the action, offering customized plans.

unnormalised: Thinking of buying that cozy 2BHK in Andheri? Or maybe a sprawling villa near Bangalore? These schemes could make it happen.
normalised: Thinking of buying that cozy two B H K in Andheri? Or maybe a sprawling villa near Bangalore? These schemes could make it happen.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma, a real estate guru, advises comparing interest rates *carefully* (duh!). Also, keep an eye out for processing fees – they can be sneaky!
normalised: Doctor Sharma, a real estate guru, advises comparing interest rates *carefully* (duh!). Also, keep an eye out for processing fees – they can be sneaky!

unnormalised: Many schemes offer benefits like lower EMIs for the first few years or top-ups for renovations. Imagine finally building that puja room you've always wanted!
normalised: Many schemes offer benefits like lower E M I's for the first few years or top-ups for renovations. Imagine finally building that puja room you've always wanted!

unnormalised: Typical loan amounts can range from Rs. 20 Lakhs to Rs. 5 Crores, depending on your income and credit score. Plus, you can often finance up to 80% of the property value – so you need to arrange only for the remaining 20% downpayment.
normalised: Typical loan amounts can range from rupee twenty lakhs to rupee five crores, depending on your income and credit score. Plus, you can often finance up to eighty percent of the property value – so you need to arrange only for the remaining twenty percent downpayment.

unnormalised: So, do your research, gather your documents, and get ready to grab that dream home! Remember to check the fine print and understand all the terms and conditions before signing on the dotted line, especially regarding property title issues and the area being sold in sq ft.
normalised: So, do your research, gather your documents, and get ready to grab that dream home! Remember to check the fine print and understand all the terms and conditions before signing on the dotted line, especially regarding property title issues and the area being sold in square feet.
